dnd5e-scriptlets.LukasSheetFilter.Name: Add Filter to character sheet
dnd5e-scriptlets.LukasSheetFilter.Hint: Allows you to filter character sheet items/spells/features by a text filter. Thanks @Lukas
dnd5e-scriptlets.AmmoSelector.Name: Ammo Selector
dnd5e-scriptlets.AmmoSelector.Hint: Enable to present a select ammo dialog when using a ranged weapon Thanks @Lukas
dnd5e-scriptlets.LukasItemRarityColors.H: Color Inventory lines according to item rarity Thanks @Lukas
dnd5e-scriptlets.AutoItemRecharge.Name: Auto recharge items
dnd5e-scriptlets.AutoItemRecharge.Hint: Auto roll to recharge items on turn start

dnd5e-scriptlets.AutoItemRechargeOptions.whisper: Recharge with chat message to GM only
dnd5e-scriptlets.AutoItemRechargeOptions.silentEnd: Recharge without chat message - at end of turn
dnd5e-scriptlets.AutoItemRechargeOptions.whisperEnd: Recharge with chat message to GM only - at end of turn
dnd5e-scriptlets.AutoItemRechargeOptions.chatterEnd: Recharge with chat message - at end of turn

dnd5e-scriptlets.LegendaryRecharge.Name: Recharge legendary actions
dnd5e-scriptlets.LegendaryRecharge.Hint: Auto recharge legendary actions on turn start
dnd5e-scriptlets.AutoRollUnlinkedHP.Name: Roll NPC HP
dnd5e-scriptlets.AutoRollUnlinkedHP.Hint: Auto roll unlinked token HP on canvas add
dnd5e-scriptlets.TokenResizer.Name: Token Resizer
dnd5e-scriptlets.TokenResizer.Hint: Adds a resize button to token controls that allows resizing of selected tokens
dnd5e-scriptlets.NoTokenSelected: DND5E-Scriptlets | Token Resizer: Select at least one token to resize
dnd5e-scriptlets.CleanRolls.Name: Clean Rolls
dnd5e-scriptlets.CleanRolls.Hint: Remove duplicate '+' and '-' from dnd5e rolls
dnd5e-scriptlets.needsLibWrapper: DND5D-Scirptlets | Clean Rolls: libwrapper must be installed and active
dnd5e-scriptlets.AlternativeAdvantage.Hi: Advantage/Disadvantage gives a roll expression bonus instead of rolling 2 dice. You can use '1d4 + @abilities.str.mod' for example
dnd5e-scriptlets.ActorCollapsibleSection: Enabled allows clicking on the inventory section name to collapse the sction
dnd5e-scriptlets.AmmoTracker.Name: Recover used ammunition
dnd5e-scriptlets.AmmoTracker.Hint: At the end of combat 1/2 of non magical ammo is recovered for each combatant
dnd5e-scriptlets.AmmoRecoveryMessage.Hin: Display the ammuntion recovered at combat end
dnd5e-scriptlets.SilentInitiative.Name: Silent Initiative
dnd5e-scriptlets.UpdateCreatedOrigins.Na: Fix Effect origins when creating actors
dnd5e-scriptlets.UpdateCreatedOrigins.Hi: When creating an actor attempt to fix the origins of any effects on the actor
dnd5e-scriptlets.BetterScrollCreation.Hi: When creating a scroll from a spell copy the effects and flags
dnd5e-scriptlets.GriddedGridless.Name: Gridded Gridless scenes
dnd5e-scriptlets.GriddedGridless.Hint: When calculating distances in a gridless scene use the gridded dnd5e distance calculations
Add a colored dot on the actor directory reflecting the actor disposition
dnd5e-scriptlets.AutoRemoveItemsFromActo: Automatically remove items from an actor when dragged from the actor's inventory to another actor/container
dnd5e-scriptlets.AutoRemoveItems.Name: Remove items from world containers
dnd5e-scriptlets.AutoRemoveItems.Hint: Automatically remove items from a world container when dragged to the an actor/container
When a token is placed on the canvas set the token dynamic ring enabled
dnd5e-scriptlets.TemplatePreview.Name: Allow previewing of templates
dnd5e-scriptlets.TemplatePreview.Hint: Add an option to template controls (left sidebar - bullseye) to allow previewing a particular template
